mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.ACODE, ADEPARTLOC, AARIVELOC, AGOTIME, AGO_ARRIVETIME, ACOME_DEPARTTIME, ACOME_ARRIVETIME, APRICE FROM ASCD A, AIR_RESERVE R WHERE A.ACODE=R.ACODE AND (AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate} AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%') AND A.ACODE NOT IN (SELECT AR.ACODE FROM AIR_RESERVE AR, ASCD A WHERE A.ACODE=AR.ACODE AND (AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate} AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%') GROUP BY AR.ACODE HAVING COUNT(SEATID) >= 10) OR A.ACODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT ACODE FROM ASCD WHERE (ACODE, AGOTIME, ACOME_DEPARTTIME) NOT IN (SELECT S.ACODE, S.AGOTIME, S.ACOME_DEPARTTIME FROM ASCD S, AIR_RESERVE R WHERE S.ACODE=R.ACODE AND AGODATE=#{agodate} AND ACOMEDATE=#{acomedate} AND ADEPARTLOC LIKE '%'||#{adepartloc}||'%' AND AARIVELOC LIKE '%'||#{aariveloc}||'%' )) ORDER BY A.ACODE
SELECT * FROM ASCD A , AIR_RESERVE R WHERE A.ACODE=R.ACODE AND A.ACODE=#{acode}
